about_the_game:
• Choose between 3 factions, each with 56 units and 72 trait variants, distinct from the other factions.
  • Upgrade your units and construct the best team you can submit on each turn.
  • Consult the combat meters and watch battles carefully to evaluate strengths and weaknesses in your strategy.





  • Use dust to redo battles, swap units into the battlefield from your bench, level up and reposition your team. The dusts of time are finite, so pick your battles carefully...
  • All units have 3 different traits that enhance their effectiveness in a variety of ways. Each faction has 3 different variants for its traits, causing traits to play differently between games. Choosing unique combinations of traits allows you to customize your team and explore new options.
  • What's your most important unit? What's your team's strategy? That's entirely up to you.





  • Every run is unique and presents you with new opportunities.
  • A run lasts a maximum of 24 turns, if you can stave off too many defeats.
  • Strive to make it further than you've gone before.
  • Try to pull off a cool trait combination and turn your melee assassin into an unkillable, healing machine. Or overwhelm your opponents by summoning an endless barrage of terrifying creatures.
  • Seek victory and most importantly have fun!

short_description: A fantasy auto-battler with roguelike elements. With 56 units and 72 trait variants in each of the 3 factions, every run is unique. Construct your best team, manage your economy and choose key battles to retry. How will you sculpt your path to victory?
